trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName> event enables you to customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트를 사용 하면의 모양을 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>소유자 그리기를 사용 하 여 제어 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트는에 의해 발생 한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>시점을 제어할는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성이로 설정 되어 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DrawListViewItemEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the item.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 정보를 포함 하는 이벤트 처리기에 전달 된 DrawListViewItemEventArgs는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>그릴 항목을 그릴 수 있도록 하는 메서드도 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> properties to retrieve information about the item to draw.
trans-unit.target: 사용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>그릴 항목에 대 한 정보를 검색 하는 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to retrieve the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>항목의 인덱스를 검색할 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>속성으로 지정 된 영역 내에서 실제 그리기를 수행 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> elements that do not need customization, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 표준 그릴 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>사용 하 여 사용자 지정 필요 하지 않은 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 그래픽 깜빡임 소유자 그리기를 재정의 하는 경우 문제를 방지 하기 위해는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>제어 하 고 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 이 기능을 응용 프로그램에 Windows XP 및 Windows Server 2003 제품군에 대해서만 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 표면 그리려는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 그릴 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> within which to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 을 그릴 영역입니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 내에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 비트 조합 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> 의 현재 상태를 나타내는 값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 그릴 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 크기와 위치를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 그릴 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 지정한 위치가의 왼쪽된 위 모퉁이 기준으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the bounds for specific portions of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 특정 부분에 대 한 범위를 검색할는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> 의 범위를 나타내는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 그릴 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> using its current background color.
trans-unit.target: 배경을 그립니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 현재 배경색을 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 현재 값을 사용 하는 표준 배경을 그릴는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 로 지정 된 영역을 채우는 배경을 그릴지는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control will use the default drawing for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 속성을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> 컨트롤은 기본에 대 한 그리기를 사용 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` when the item does not require custom drawing.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 `true` 항목 사용자 지정 그리기를 필요 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you need to customize only certain items within the control, such as selected items.
trans-unit.target: 선택 된 항목 같은 컨트롤 내에서 특정 항목에만 사용자 지정 해야 할 경우에 유용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system draws the item; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the event handler draws the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>시스템 항목; 그리는 경우 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 이면 이벤트 처리기는 항목을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> if it has focus.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 포커스 영역을 그립니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 에 포커스가 있으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the item.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여 항목 둘레 표준 포커스 사각형을 그립니다.

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle is normally drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 사각형으로 지정 된 영역 내에서 그려집니다 일반적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the control is in the details view and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is `false`, however, the focus rectangle is drawn around the default text area for the first column of the item.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 자세히 보기에는 컨트롤이 이면 및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 값은 `false`, 포커스 영역 주위에 그리는 기본 텍스트 영역 항목의 첫 번째 열에 대 한.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle is drawn only when the item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 포커스 사각형 되므로이 메서드를 호출 하기 전에 항목의 포커스 상태를 확인 하지 않고도 항목에 포커스가 있을 때만 그려집니다.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> using its current foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트를 그립니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 현재 전경색을 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the item text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여의 현재 값을 사용 하 여 항목 텍스트를 그리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 으로 지정 된 영역 내에서 텍스트를 그리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw the text manually using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 수동으로 텍스트를 그릴 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>통해 검색 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method is most useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>메서드는 가장 유용한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> 이외의 값으로 설정 되어</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the details view, this method draws the text for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, but does not draw the text for subitems.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 세부 정보 뷰에서 대 한 텍스트를 그리는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, 하지만 하위 항목에 대 한 텍스트를 그리지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, in the details view, it is generally more convenient to draw all of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> text in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 세부 정보 뷰에서 것이 일반적으로 더 편리를 그리는 모든는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>텍스트에 대 한 처리기에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트를 그립니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 현재 전경색을 사용 하 여 지정 된 서식 지정 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the item text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 사용 하 여의 현재 값을 사용 하 여 항목 텍스트를 그리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>에 지정 된 값은 `flags` 매개 변수를 사용 하면 텍스트 맞춤과 같은 노드 레이블에 대 한 서식 속성을 제공할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 으로 지정 된 영역 내에서 텍스트를 그리는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw the text manually using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 수동으로 텍스트를 그릴 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>통해 검색 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method is most useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>메서드는 가장 유용한 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> 이외의 값으로 설정 되어</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the details view, this method draws the text for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, but does not draw the text for subitems.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 세부 정보 뷰에서 대 한 텍스트를 그리는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, 하지만 하위 항목에 대 한 텍스트를 그리지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, in the details view, it is generally more convenient to draw all of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> text in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 세부 정보 뷰에서 것이 일반적으로 더 편리를 그리는 모든는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>텍스트에 대 한 처리기에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 비트 조합 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> 그리는 데 사용 되는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>클래스 속성 및 그리기 디스플레이 장치에 관한 유용한 메서드를 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 그릴 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하 여 액세스 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: 이 때 유용는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>속성 요구 사항에 맞게 적절 한 정보를 제공 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether an item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>속성만 항목이 선택,이 옵션을 선택 되거나 포커스가 있는 결정 하는, 예를 들어 사용할 수 있는 기본 상태 정보를 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Item property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: 이 항목은 반면에 액세스할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> 의 모든 멤버

trans-unit.source: You must access the item directly, for example, to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value yourself rather than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 직접 액세스 해야 항목, 예를 들어 그릴는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>값을 사용 하지 않고 직접는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 그릴 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*> collection of the containing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 내에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>포함 하는 컬렉션 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 내에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 컬렉션입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: 현재 상태를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> 그릴 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> to draw is in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하 여 확인 여부는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>특정 상태에는 그리려는.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This property provides only basic state information about the item.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 항목에 대 한 기본 상태 정보를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to determine whether an item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: 항목 선택,이 옵션을 선택 또는 초점을 맞춘 확인 하려면 예를 들어이 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you need to know more, retrieve the item through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property and check its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용을 해야 할 경우 통해 항목을 검색는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>속성 및 해당 속성을 직접 확인 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 비트 조합 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> 의 현재 상태를 나타내는 값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>합니다.
